ygData.subject: Re: Romancing in the Mess Hall
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She looked at him and looked down. She closed her eyes and shook her head.  I...I..  she couldn t just say no to him.  But she didn t want to do that

::Feline::

She looked at him and looked down. She closed her eyes and shook her 
head.  "I...I.."  she couldn't just say no to him.  But she didn't 
want to do that just yet.  She pulled one of her heands back and 
rubbed her shoulder a little.  She let a tear roll down her cheek and 
she whispered, "yes" She turned her head away from him and trembled a 
little.  Her body language said 'absolutely not'.   She showed 
compliance, not enthusiasm.  


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> Hot Rod couldn't believe himself. In all his millions of years of 
life,
> he had only fallen for two bots before now. There was the Autobot
> ArrCee, but she left him for Springer. There was Savanna, but she 
was
> killed before they could even date. And here he was kissing a bot he
> knew for only a few hours. But he liked it.
> He was in love with her. He kissed her again, and again. He 
wispered, in
> her ear, 
> "Want to go to my room...?" He stoped, knowing she got the point.
> 
> OOC: Good god! He has walked right into that seductive bi***'s 
hands!
> LOL
